attributes.action:
Parliament to legalise
mobile structures
up to 100m2 on land 
for living
attributes.additional_details:
Across the world 
Truck life and 
The tiny house community is getting bigger everyday 
 it's giving shelter to those could never afford it

It's given shelter 
 to the homeless 
and the needy 
and just other people 
that choose 
 to live a different way of life 

Other than what society 
says you should live 
Like in a flat or house etc.... 

Please reinstate 
THE FREEDOM of CHOICE 
for living your own way of LIFE
attributes.background:
Parliament to consider legalising
In the Uk
That living 
In mobile structure
that is under 100 m² 
On land in the UK 
Would not 
Require 
Planing permission 

Normally
 if people want to live on land
it can be a very costly process 
And out of the average persons reach
